segments.text: It took them four minutes to get here . That was pretty fast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's fast . But four minutes is enough to do fifty thousand dollars damage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess the fire wasn't in the tool shed after all.It looks like the back of the house was burning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wonder if anyone can call the Ridleys about this . Do you know them well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know where they're vacationing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think they went to Mexico , but I'm not sure.It ' s a bad thing to return home to.They ' ll come home from their trip , and they'll see half their house burned .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but at least this way no one gets hurt.It ' s better to have a fire in your house when you're not home . Don't you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I suppose . It's a dangerous thing if a fire starts when people are sleeping .
segments.speaker: S2
